name: Owen Williams
label: Machine Learning / Software Engineer
summary: Experienced Machine Learning Engineer with a strong technical background in software engineering and cloud technologies. Specialized in developing and deploying ML solutions with increasing focus on Natural Language Processing / LLM applications. Proven track record of delivering complex AI projects from concept to production in regulated environments. Experienced in leading technical teams, mentoring junior colleagues, and driving continuous improvement.

work_experience.summary: Led the ML team which delivered AI products to 10 NHS trusts

interests.name: Robotics/electronics
interests.summary: I have a passion for building robots and electronics projects, particularly those that involve machine learning and AI. I enjoy working with microcontrollers and developing custom hardware solutions.

projects.title: Teddington Robotics - Go! (Dual VESC Balancebot Chair)
projects.summary: Built a self balancing chair for my daugter's favourite teddy bear
